summary: It\'s my Fan Made Skyrim Video...
descriptionHtml:
Hello, I\'m John Chi, Aka Obblivion in Korean Website.

It\'s my Fan Made Skyrim Video! I might be quite Clumsy, since it seems clumsy to me too :D
But please point out things that seem awkward or strange, it helps me to get better.

Only The Sixth One for now(story doesn\'t flow by the number, so I suppose that it doesn\'t matter)

I\'m Korean, so probably there will be some Korean Alphabets in the video. But Please do not mind, because they only mean my name and Credits for Bethesda : D


Used Mods:
Slow time ring-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9521

Music:
Beethoven Symphony Nb.7 Act 2 Alegretto

Thank you for watching!


Youtube Version:
http://youtu.be/HBTMB7j8K6Q
author: johnchi
